title: Internship ‚Äì Software developer with Angular
description: IDEMIACasablancaStageHybrideil y a 6 heure(s)Since our founding, IDEMIA has been on a mission to unlock the world and make it safer through our cutting-edge identity technologies. Our technology leadership makes us the partner of choice for hundreds of governments and thousands of enterprises in over 180 countries, including some of the biggest and most influential brands in the world. I n applying our unique expertise in biometrics and cryptography, we enable our clients to unlock simpler and safer ways to pay, connect, access, identify, travel and protect public places ‚Äì at scale and in total security.Our teams work from 5 continents and speak 100+ different languages. We strongly believe that our diversity is a key driver of innovation and performance.PurposeReporting to the senior developer/lead developer, the intern will participate in the development and improvement of a web application based on the Angular framework.Key Missions‚Ä¢ Participate in the design and development of dynamic and responsive user interfaces using Angular‚Ä¢ Contribute to performance optimization and code quality‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews and the continuous integration process‚Ä¢ Perform unit and functional tests‚Ä¢ Write technical documentation related to the developmentsProfile & Other Information‚Ä¢ Engineering school student‚Ä¢ Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, TypeScript, and JavaScript‚Ä¢ Knowledge of the Angular framework (v10+)‚Ä¢ Understanding of the component model and data binding‚Ä¢ Basic knowledge of REST API consumption‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Git/GitHub/GitLab‚Ä¢ (Optional) Basic knowledge of , RxJS, NgRx, or Bootstrap/Tailwind‚Ä¢ Team spirit and collaborative approach‚Ä¢ Autonomy and technical curiosity‚Ä¢ Rigor and ability to document work‚Ä¢ Willingness to learn and grow in an agile environmentBy choosing to work at IDEMIA, you will join a unique tech company, offering a wide range of growth opportunities. You will contribute to a safer world, collaborating with an international and global community. We value the diversity of our teams and welcome people from all walks of life, regardless of how they look, where they come from, who they love, or what they think.We deliver cutting edge, future proof innovation that reach the highest technological standards and we‚Äôre transforming, fast, to stay a leader in a world that‚Äôs changing fast, too.At IDEMIA, people can develop their expertise and feel a sense of ownership and empowerment, in a global environment, as part of a company with the ambition and the ability to change the world.Visit our website to know more about the leader in Identity Technologies
